turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello Samantha, I need you to order a coffee for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes ma'am, which shop would you like it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks in Villa Rica

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes ma'am, the one off of Highway 61 in Villa Rica.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I would like a Grande Cinnamon Shortbread Frappucino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What type of milk would you like it to be made with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What types of milk do they offer for this beverage?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It traditionally comes with whole milk, but they also offer nonfat, 2%, soy, almond, or coconut milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole milk is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And would you like whipped cream on top?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The whipped cream is topped with nutmeg and cinnamon, is this ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what time would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I should be there around 9:45 AM.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok sounds perfect I am ordering it now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. Ok your order has been placed and will be ready for pickup at the Starbucks in Villa Rica at 9:45 AM.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. Please call me if you need anything else.

items.name: Yes. I would like a Grande Cinn
